content:
236 
 
COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  UTME SUBJECTS  SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
      
  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
(i) AAU and OAU require CRS/IS and an Arts or a Social 
Science subject.  
(ii) AAUA and EKSU require two (2) Arts subjects and 
one (1) other subject.  
(iii) AUGUSTINE requires CRS/IS and any other Arts 
subjects.  
(iv) BENIN accepts any three (3) subjects.  
(v) SAU requires CRS, Government or History and any 
other Arts subject.  
(vi) UYO requires CRS and other two (2) subjects from 
Arts or Social Sciences.  
  
  
COMPARATIVE  RELIGIOUS  
STUDIES  
ILORIN      
Two (2) ‘A’ level passes 
in Christian/ IS and any  
other  Arts/    
Sciences/Social 
Science subjects.  
  
ii) ND/ NCE in Christian 
/IS.  
Five (5) SSC credit passes to 
include English Language, IS 
and three (3) other  
Arts/Social  
Sciences/Science subjects.  
  
CRS/IS and two (2)  
other Arts or Social 
Science subjects.  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
(i) ILORIN accepts ND in Religious Studies or Theology 
of Ibadan, London, or any accredited University in 
Nigeria.  
  
UTME  
(ii) ILORIN accepts candidates who do not have CRS or 
IS but who meet the UTME requirements  
YORUBA  
AAUA         
EKSU  
FOUNTAIN  
 IBADAN      
ILORIN         
OAU  
OOU  
POL-ACAD  
Two (2) ‘A’ level passes 
to include Yoruba or 
Literature in English.  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes to 
include Yoruba and English 
Language.  
  
Yoruba and two (2) 
other subjects in  
Arts  or  Social  
Sciences.  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
(i) IBADAN accepts two (2) ‘A’ level passes to include 
Yoruba and another Arts or Social Science 
subject,It acceptsNCE credit/merit in Yoruba and 
another Arts or Social Science subject.  
(ii) OAU accepts NCE merit in Yoruba   
(iii) ILORIN requires NCE/ND upper credit in Yoruba 
and Social Science subjects.  
  
UTME
